channel.title: Huge problem
channel.description:
I've never seen this fixed before, And it's a huge pain, and that is when you drop more than 1 of the same item on the ground, for example '20 manta rays' or in my case, I pked someone who droped these, I went to pick up 1 manta ray, and the whole 20 disappeared, Like the 20 goes into 1...
Same with rune arrows.. Im not sure if they stack but when you pic em up you only get 1.. pls help

item.title: Huge problem
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

How do I turn it off or where?

Read full topic
